cu.explanation_en: Setting the physical layer log level to an invalid enum value will cause logging initialization errors and impair physical layer diagnostics.

du.explanation_en: Setting the RF simulator model name to an invalid value will cause simulator configuration failures and prevent proper RF signal simulation.
du.explanation_zh: 將 RF 模擬器模型名稱設定為無效值會導致模擬器配置失敗，並阻止正確的 RF 信號模擬。
